title: Bok Choy
description: Watch and learn how to cut bok choy using Calphalon Self-Sharpening Cutlery.

asset.title: Bok Choy
asset.description: Watch and learn how to cut bok choy using Calphalon Self-Sharpening Cutlery. For more videos, visit www.knifeskills.com
asset.author: Calphalon

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

We'll be using this five inch santoku knife. We're gonna take the root off here. Purpose of taking that root off is all these beautiful leaves coming out. We're gonna take these leaves and we're gonna rough chop them. Not a uniform size but it does not have to be perfect. The inside part of the cok choy we're gonna half. This half is perfect for brazing and you can also quarter it. Here we have the seven inch santoku. we're gonna root this and cut strips on one. With the left over leaves, we'll cut them nice and thin. Just always remember to keep your finger tip back. Here we wave bok choy rough cut for sauteing , we have half and quarter for brazing, nice long thin Julianne cut, and just a leaf thin cut for salads.
